title: Look At the Table
text: Notice that the table has $$\frac{2}{5}$$ listed for the P(x) value for blue. This is due to the fact that there is a probability of $$\frac{2}{5}$$ of spinning a blue since $$P(blue)=\frac{2}{5}$$.
speech: Notice that the table has  2 fifths  listed for the P(x) value for blue. This is due to the fact that there is a probability of  2 fifths  of spinning a blue since ,   p of parentheses blue  is equal to 2 fifths .

title: Determining Red's P(x)
text: What is the value for P(x) for red, P(red)?
